article_title: We're Still at War: Photo of the Day for January 2, 2014
article_text: U.S. Army Pfc. Cody Teel, left, watches as Spc. Mohammed Abbas throws an expended 105mm howitzer shell during live-fire training on Joint Base Elmendorf-Richardson, Alaska, Dec. 18, 2013. Teel and Abbas are assigned to the 25th Infantry Division's 2nd Battalion, 377th Parachute Field Artillery Regiment, 4th Infantry Brigade Combat Team, Alaska. (U.S. Air Force photo by Justin Connaher)
